body: we need more good asushin doujins

@narcowalrus I have never said that the artists shouldn't be paid, I said that intellectual property isn't a valid thing. The artists are still getting money and recognition even though some of their readers are from free hosting sites like this one. Get a life, Walrus. Go read some Kinsella.

@thedrunkone Because you're a cowardly asshole who calls people who just want to be paid "fucktards" and acts like he's better than everyone else, that's why: https://nhentai.net/g/278318/#comment-975392 And you're lucky you got away with it, too, because that would definitely have gotten your ass kicked.
Unbelievably good. How did I miss this one?
